member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.BillingClient
member.summary: Billing client provides access to billing resources for Azure Web-Direct subscriptions. Other subscription types which were not purchased directly through the Azure web portal are not supported through this preview API.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.IInvoicesOperations
member.summary: InvoicesOperations operations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.IInvoicesOperations.ListWithHttpMessagesAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lists the available invoices for a subscription in reverse chronological order beginning with the most recent invoice. In preview, invoices are available via this API only for invoice periods which end December 1, 2016 or later
member.param: May be used to expand the downloadUrl property within a list of invoices. This enables download links to be generated for multiple invoices at once. By default, downloadURLs are not included when listing invoices.
May be used to filter invoices by invoicePeriodEndDate. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'

Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N invoices.
The headers that will be added to request.
The cancellation token.
member.exception: Thrown when the operation returned an invalid status code
Thrown when unable to deserialize the response
Thrown when a required parameter is null

member.summary: Gets a named invoice resource. When getting a single invoice, the downloadUrl property is expanded automatically.
member.param: The name of an invoice resource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.InvoicesOperationsExtensions.List(Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.IInvoicesOperations,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Lists the available invoices for a subscription in reverse chronological order beginning with the most recent invoice. In preview, invoices are available via this API only for invoice periods which end December 1, 2016 or later
member.param: The operations group for this extension method.

May be used to expand the downloadUrl property within a list of invoices. This enables download links to be generated for multiple invoices at once. By default, downloadURLs are not included when listing invoices.
May be used to filter invoices by invoicePeriodEndDate. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'

Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N invoices.

member.summary: Lists the available invoices for a subscription in reverse chronological order beginning with the most recent invoice. In preview, invoices are available via this API only for invoice periods which end December 1, 2016 or later
member.param: The operations group for this extension method.

May be used to expand the downloadUrl property within a list of invoices. This enables download links to be generated for multiple invoices at once. By default, downloadURLs are not included when listing invoices.
May be used to filter invoices by invoicePeriodEndDate. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'

Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N invoices.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.Models.Invoice
member.summary: An invoice resource can be used download a PDF version of an invoice.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Invoice class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.Models.Invoice.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.Models.DownloadUrl)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Invoice class.
member.param: Resource Id
Resource name
Resource type
The start of the date range covered by the invoice.
The end of the date range covered by the invoice.
A secure link to download the PDF version of an invoice. The link will cease to work after its expiry time is reached.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.Models.Invoice.InvoicePeriodStartDate
member.summary: Gets the start of the date range covered by the invoice.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.Models.Invoice.InvoicePeriodEndDate
member.summary: Gets the end of the date range covered by the invoice.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Billing.Models.Invoice.DownloadUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a secure link to download the PDF version of an invoice. The link will cease to work after its expiry time is reached.
